title: National Gallery of Art Paintings
description: This visualization contains all of the photographed paintings from the National Gallery of Art

title: NGA and LoC Prints and Drawings
description:
This visualization contains all of the photographed items from the National Gallery of Art's prints and drawings collections, as well as a selection of book illustrations taken from the Library of Congress' Rosenwald Collection.

See the version colored by collection

title: NGA and LoC Prints and Drawings (Colorized)
description:
This visualization contains all of the photographed items from the National Gallery of Art's prints and drawings collections, as well as a selection of book illustrations taken from the Library of Congress' Rosenwald Collection.

See the un-colorized version

title: NGA and Kress Collection Paintings
description:
This visualization contains all of the photographed paintings from the National Gallery of Art, as well as images of the catalogued paintings from the Kress Collection.

See the version colored by collection.

title: NGA and Kress Collection Paintings (Colorized)
description:
This visualization contains all of the photographed paintings from the National Gallery of Art, as well as images of the catalogued paintings from the Kress Collection.

See the un-colorized version.
